description: Create Forms Easily with React and Redux
name: react-redux-form

scripts.build: npm run build:umd && npm run build:lib
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && mv ./_book/index.html ./_book/docs.html && cp -a ./home/ ./_book/ && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs' && git push git@github.com:davidkpiano/react-redux-form gh-pages --force
scripts.prepublish: npm test && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run tsdef
scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run lint
